Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.Model.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    Game class. This is the main class, where players, cards and dice are saved.
    Author:
    Gregorio Galletti, Ibrahim El Shemy

      • setPublicObjectives

        public java.util.List<PublicObjective> setPublicObjectives()
        Method that reads from a file 3 PublicObjectives in a random way and returns them.
        Returns:
        a List of 3 PublicObjectives chosen randomly, that will be used during the Game by all the Players.
